about_the_game:
Wanted dead by a mysterious and far-reaching organization, you will traverse the futuristic city of Harbor Prime and make unexpected allies on your quest to bring down the system! In this cyberpunk adventure inspired by Blade Runner and Neuromancer, you are free to choose your playstyle: will you be a silent assassin, a hacker, a diplomat or a straightforward gunfighter?

Demo version contains 7 full featured locations of Harbor Prime. You can follow a demo storyline considering the base values of humanity, the need for survival and possible human technological progress, or complete several included side quests. Try all of the features appearing in the full game. Learn the basics of hacking. Take down few thugs in action like street fight, overcome your enemies in dangerous gun fight or sneak by them using clever stealth technique.

Explore the city full of drugs, corruption, prostitution, violence, and future technologies.
detailed_description:
Wanted dead by a mysterious and far-reaching organization, you will traverse the futuristic city of Harbor Prime and make unexpected allies on your quest to bring down the system! In this cyberpunk adventure inspired by Blade Runner and Neuromancer, you are free to choose your playstyle: will you be a silent assassin, a hacker, a diplomat or a straightforward gunfighter?

Demo version contains 7 full featured locations of Harbor Prime. You can follow a demo storyline considering the base values of humanity, the need for survival and possible human technological progress, or complete several included side quests. Try all of the features appearing in the full game. Learn the basics of hacking. Take down few thugs in action like street fight, overcome your enemies in dangerous gun fight or sneak by them using clever stealth technique.

Explore the city full of drugs, corruption, prostitution, violence, and future technologies.
name: Dex Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP (SP2 or newer) / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium/AMD, 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 / ATI™ Radeon™ 2600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or Windows compatible gamepad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5, 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 650M / AMD™ Radeon™ HD 5770 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or Windows compatible gamepad

reviews:
“Dex is great for a lot of reasons. It combines expressive 2D sprites and nostalgic platforming with some grade-A, modern action-RPG mechanics and does it generally well.”
8,5/10 – Arcade Sushi

“What we have here is a standout in multiple ways. Almost best in class, really.”
8/10 – Chalgyr's Game Room

“Dreadlocks has left no stone unturned in its quest to craft an authentic cyberpunk world.”
Strategy Informer
short_description: This demo is a quick hit of the open-world, side-scrolling cyberpunk RPG that is Dex. Explore the streets of a cyberpunk city as you run for your life from the mercs of The Complex hunting you down.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Polish, Czech
*languages with full audio support
